entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
